plot: Cockroaches Gokicha and Chaba move from Kanto to Hokkaido, giving their newly-found life experiences from the perspective of this indestructible insect. Though others see them only as squashable nuisances, these vermin are personified using young female faces and voices, as they open their misunderstood world to us in their own uniquely cute way.
opening_theme: "Gokkyun! Days (ごっきゅん！デイズ)" by Mamiko Noto
